newsitem.title: JAPAN: Kobe rubber futures higher in after-hours trade.
newsitem.headline: Kobe rubber futures higher in after-hours trade.

text.p: Kobe rubber futures were higher in all months in the after-hours session on Friday, as bullish sentiment remained from the day's trading, traders said.
A higher expiry price of the spot October contract encouraged investors to buy, traders said.
The spot October expired in midday at 126.0 yen, up 0.6 from Thursday's close, with 847 lots of deliveries.

The yen's weaker tone against the dollar also accelerated the buying orders, traders said. "Investors accelerated buying in the afternoon. But the ample rubber stocks in Japan is still a bearish factor," a brokerage house trader said.
